All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Card
Card class : Provides methods and attributes for each individual Card
Deck
Deck class : Generates 112 cards to be used to during play
Hand
Hand class represents a player's hand of Uno cards.
Player
Player class represents a player in the Uno game.
Round
The `Round` class represents a round of Uno card game.
Uno
Uno Class: Used to start and manage an Uno card game.
